question:
The company style of art was developed in cities with which of the following qualities?
1) These cities had monuments and an inflow of foreign officials or tourists
2) These cities had expatriates from England.
Select the correct answer from the codes given below:
explanation:
The company style of paintings was not a Pan-India phenomenon. This style developed in some cities only which had any of the following qualities:
1) These cities had monuments and an inflow of foreign officials or tourists
2) These cities had expatriates from England.
